Text: Do you know how I can join the Church of Scientology?

choice1.Value: I don’t know for sure, but taking your shirt off is probably a good start.
choice1.Text: Thanks. Also, quick question: what is the only thing that breaks the mold?
Correct! Keep this up and the pants are coming off too.

choice2.Text: You are dumb as a rock. I’m putting my shirt back on, Loser.
